a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Infectious and parasitic diseases death rate, 1950 to 2022
The reported annual death rate from infectious and parasitic diseases per 100,000 people, based on the
underlying cause listed on death certificates.
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have been
registered with a cause of death.
